News Analysis

Welker bolts for Denver

After six seasons and 672 receptions in New England, Wes Welker has agreed to a two-year deal with the Broncos. The Patriots moved quickly to counter the move, signing former Rams receiver Danny Amendola.
  • Loading comments... | Add yours Share now:
  • Danny Amendola agrees to deal with Patriots
  • Finn: Pats dared Welker to leave | Survey Big mistake?

Bergoglio chooses name Pope Francis

Newly elected Pope Francis I appears on the central balcony of St. Peter's Basilica. Getty Images
Catholics in St. Peter's Square reacted to the news of the pope's selection. Eric Gaillard / Reuters
Faithful waved an Argentine flag in St. Peter's Square after Pope Francis was named the church’s next leader. Gregorio Borgia / Associated Press
Catholics at Metropolitan Cathedral in Buenos Aires celebrated Pope Francis's selection. Juan Mabromata / AFP / Getty Images
A massive crowd had gathered in St. Peter’s Square awaiting the decision. Tiziana Fabi / AFP / Getty Images
Pope Francis put on vestments while standing on the St. Peter's Basilica balcony. Tony Gentile / Reuters
Crowds cheered after white smoke billowed from the Sistine Chapel’s chimney earlier today. Dmitry Lovetsky / Associated Press
White smoke rose from the chimney on the roof of the Sistine Chapel. Filippo Monteforte / AFP / Getty Images
A Swiss guard saluted tonight while standing in St. Peter's Square. Gregorio Borgia / Associated Press
Faithful reacted in St Peter's Square after white smoke billowed from the chimney. Filippo Monteforte / AFP / Getty Images

Four dead in N.Y. shootings

A man opened fire at a car wash and a barbershop a mile apart in upstate New York on Wednesday, killing four people and wounding at least two others, and 64-year-old suspect Kurt Meyers was being sought, police said.

Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race
